Project.Brief history of your project and organi: KyFromAbove oblique imagery can be found in this folder. The four oblique views associated with each s imagery was acquired during the fall and spring leaf-off seasons as sun angle and weather conditions permitted.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: KyFromAbove oblique imagery can be found in this folder. The four oblique views associated with each ortho image are provided in a 3-band (RGB) COG format using the default 512x512 tile setting. There are no oblique images available for Phases 1 and 2. Phase 3 dat2 = Fall) as imagery was acquired during the fall and spring leaf-off seasons as sun angle and weather conditions permitted.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: We used the Go language to develop a set of tools that automatically download, cut, package data, and place orders. The tool will download the data set file from AWS, package the data set into a car file of the corresponding size by setting parameters such as sector size, and then distribute the car file to each SP through bandwidth and hard disk mail. Then, we use Boost to issue orders offline to let the SP start packaging using the Lotus program.
